title: LoopExecuteRequestV1
description: Schema for the request body of the /loop/execute endpoint, version 1.

request_id.description: A unique identifier for this execution request.

plan_input.description: The input plan or task details to be processed by the GovernanceCore. The exact structure of this object will depend on the specific plan schema being used by GovernanceCore for a given task.

operator_override_signal.description: An optional field to pass an operator override signal. If provided, this object must conform to the operator_override.schema.v1.json.
